description.raw:
This is a rebranched version of pull request #12. Original description:

This is a simplified version of the Operational Space controller in pull request #2 that uses DART to simulate a double pendulum (borrowed from [gazebo_ros_demos/rrbot_description](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_demos/blob/kinetic-devel/rrbot_description/urdf/rrbot.xml)), but a PID controller is implemented outside the plugin in `DoublePendulum_TEST.cc`, with the plugin interface providing effort inputs and joint position outputs. A follow-up pull request will re-implement the physics backend with another physics engine and use the same PID controller in the test. This goal is to demonstrate an abstract interface in which multiple physics engines can be plugged in and out.
